Personally I like ntr for the hot fuck scenes that rarely happen in vanilla and I don't put myself in as a cuck or cuckee. Ntr tends to be generic... duh, as are most other hentai genres. Vanilla by far is the biggest offender, if only because vanilla is the most common genre but you can find great gems if you look hard enough.

If you don't like NTR or Cheating, DON'T read! If you do like it, this is a great series. This specific doujin is Part 3 of a series. The art is fantastic. And while it's technically NTR, it's pretty consensual on all sides. It's not a Rape NTR doujin, which, honestly, is pretty refreshing. And the person doing the cucking isn't an ugly bastard, which is also refreshing. A must read (if you like NTR). 9/10
